Description: In 2023 and 2024, allegations of procurement irregularities against beleaguered IDT chief executive Tebogo Malaka were swept under the carpet by the then IDT chair Kwazi Mshengu and the then minister Sihle Zikalala. These interventions included quashing a forensic probe facilitated by the National Treasury and whitewashing an audit by Zikalala’s department.
